subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
They did just about everything. I already posted what they enjoy in an  
earlier post.

I know they liked to have drove Erland crazy. They tend to pick on  
those listening to low level evp - those people who, in the beginning  
listen a lot and try to dig voices out of anything they record instead  
of just the Class A's. They seem to really like people suffering deep  
grief as they can really have a party with them and convince them they  
are their "dead" child, relative, etc... I know a few AAEVP members  
who have tangled with them.

They are often referred to as ''The Demons of EVP".

w

On Aug 17, 2008, at 4:23 PM, Lisby wrote:

> What did they do and say to you?
>
>
> Ann
